cause.description:
by joining this cause you will be encouraging peace in the middle east. helping to stop killing people and innocent children during the conflicts in the region. NO MORE WAR.... YES FOR PEACE.... THE MIDDLE EAST WANTS TO LIVE IN PEACE!
1. it's a human right to live safe and in peace
cause.mission: Encourage Peace in the Middle East
cause.name: STOP THE WAR IN MIDDLE EAST
